title.narrative: 211 COMMUNICATION FOR DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: Provide effective and sustainable partnerships and capacity for Countries to design, deliver and report behaviour change and demand for services that drive the achievement of Headline Results., which contributes to Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Comprehensive, sustainable and enabling environment that leaves no child behind is supported by policies, programmes, strategies, budgets and actions of Governments, regional institutions, private sector, media, financial institutions, UN and UNICEF country programmes in South Asia, in development and humanitarian contexts.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Provide effective and sustainable partnerships and capacity for Countries to design, deliver and report behaviour change anddemand for services that drive the achievement of Headline Results.

description.narrative: In 2021 SBC has facilitated changing behaviors, increasing demand and uptake of services and protective practices based on evidence and online/offline community feedback and rolling out partnerships e.g. faith actors that is envisioned to facilitate shift of social norms in the coming years. | Status:Met | As-of Date:22/12/2021
